name: clOne (Nick Miller - VR Developer)
description:
This is my Game Engine Design course at Digipen, it is inspired by the great game flOw. The goal is simple: reach the end with as many links as possible

Controls:

  • Your character will move in the direction of your mouse
  • Left click to use your wings and speed up
  • Right click to use your bombs and destroy nearby enemies

Intructions:

Unzip the archive and run clOne/Game Engine/clOne.exe
